alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 4:01PM AKST until March 10 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT AKST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with periods of low visibility expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Eastern Alaska Range. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to midnight AKST Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Travel could be very difficult. Snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will develop tonight and continue into Thursday night. Winds will increase on Thursday causing blowing and drifting snow with periods of low visibility on Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
